wikipedia_page.main: Mark Scott Sloan (born 14 December 1967) is an English retired footballer. He was born in Wallsend on 14 December 1967. He played as a striker. Since retirement he works as a fireman in Tyneside.

response: * Scott Sloan (Doonesbury), a character in the comic strip Doonesbury
* A. Scott Sloan (1820–1895), United States Representative from Wisconsin
